---
title: Placental Methylome Browser
date: 2019-01-01

A project where me and one of our lab's rotation students, Yifan Yin, created a shiny app to
explore epigenetic (DNA methylation) data from placental samples we collected.

I no longer actively maintain this app, but it lives here:

[https://wvictor.shinyapps.io/dmr-project/](https://wvictor.shinyapps.io/dmr-project/)

[source](https://github.com/Yifan-Yin/DMR-Project/tree/master)
